CLOTHING_TRAVELERS_GARB.name: Traveler's Garb
CLOTHING_TRAVELERS_GARB.description: Simple layered clothes suited for adventuring. Offers no real protection.

SHIELD_LEATHER_LARGE.name: Large Leather Shield
SHIELD_LEATHER_LARGE.description: A large shield made of hide.

COPPER_COINS.name: Quarter-bits
COPPER_COINS.description: Copper quarter-bits stamped with the four kingdoms of Travia.

GOLD_COINS.name: Quadbits
GOLD_COINS.description: Gold quadbits, the standard currency of Travia's four kingdoms.

MITHRIL_COINS.name: Dwarven Rune-bars
MITHRIL_COINS.description: Rare dwarven currency from the Throne of the Gods, marked with ancient runes.

SILVER_COINS.name: Half-bits
SILVER_COINS.description: Silver half-bits, common trade coins in Stormreach markets.

FOOD_ALE.name: Pint of Riverside Ale
FOOD_ALE.description: Frothy dock worker's ale, brewed in Stormreach's Riverside district.

FOOD_WINE.name: Bottle of Dalehaven Wine
FOOD_WINE.description: Fine wine from the vineyards of Dalehaven, a luxury in Stormreach.

SPIKE_IRON.name: Iron Spike
SPIKE_IRON.description: Can be used to wedge doors.

POTION_INVULNERABILITY.name: Potion of Invulnerability
POTION_INVULNERABILITY.description: Makes you nearly immune to damage.

SCROLL_TREASURE_LOCATION.name: Scroll of Treasure Location
SCROLL_TREASURE_LOCATION.description: Detects treasure veins and ore deposits.

SCROLL_DOOR_CREATION.name: Scroll of Door Creation
SCROLL_DOOR_CREATION.description: Creates a door in a wall.

BASTARD_SWORD.name: Bastard Sword
BASTARD_SWORD.description: Can be used one or two-handed.

FLAIL.name: Flail
FLAIL.description: A spiked ball on a chain.

GLAIVE.name: Glaive
GLAIVE.description: A polearm with a single-edged blade.

LANCE.name: Lance
LANCE.description: Used from horseback (or maybe just long).

LUCERNE_HAMMER.name: Lucerne Hammer
LUCERNE_HAMMER.description: A polearm with hammer and spike.

LOCKPICKS.name: Lockpicks
LOCKPICKS.description: A set of basic lockpicks for opening locks.

THIEVES_TOOLS.name: Thieves' Tools
THIEVES_TOOLS.description: Professional lockpicking and trap disarming tools.

SKELETON_KEY.name: Skeleton Key
SKELETON_KEY.description: A master key that can open most locks.

LONGSWORD_FROST_BRAND.name: Frost Brand Longsword
LONGSWORD_FROST_BRAND.description: A longsword that radiates freezing cold.

DAGGER_FLAME.name: Flaming Dagger
DAGGER_FLAME.description: A dagger with a blade of fire.

DAGGER_FROST.name: Frost Dagger
DAGGER_FROST.description: A dagger that freezes on contact.
